Text.Page: Soldier, I need a courier. After the last argon surge, our lines of communication got crossed. We can't let that continue.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I'm happy to help."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Excellent. Head out to the {@Rgn:48004} and deliver these orders to {@LinkCreature:248#1015}. On your way, find {@LinkCreature:78#1012} around {@Rgn:78001} and order him back to base.

Dismissed.

Back to base? But I haven't finished delivering supplies.

This stuff's perishable. Do you think you could drop it off for me?"If it's on my way, absolutely."

Great! {@LinkCreature:78#1009} roasted some piglings for the blacksmiths at the {@Rgn:48001}.

Find {@LinkCreature:248#1044} southeast of the fortress. He'll be the hungry-looking aman with a big hammer.

By the titans, that smells good! I haven't had fresh meat in...I can't even remember!

Now, if we can just stay alive long enough to enjoy this."Argon troubles?"
Always. If you're heading toward {@Rgn:78001}, could you kill some argonomorph corpsefiends for me? It's on your way, and would help keep my people alive.

Nice to meet you, . Muhrak speaks well of you.

Thanks for the orders. When we got cut off, I worried about keeping my people here. If we can harness argon technology, though, it would change the war.

I hope it's worth the risk.
